title: Distribution of electoral democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It captures to which extent political leaders are elected under comprehensive voting rights in free and fair elections, and freedoms of association and expression are guaranteed. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
